titles.title: Restoring the Armed Career Criminal Act

Restoring the Armed Career Criminal Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Restoring the Armed Career Criminal Act
This bill modifies the prior convictions that trigger a 15-year enhanced mandatory minimum prison term for a defendant who commits a firearms offense after three or more such prior convictions.
